title: Sunset Luau
shortDescription: Experience traditional island dancing and cuisine under the stars.
longDescription: Join us for an unforgettable evening of music, hula performances, and a buffet featuring local delicacies. Perfect for all ages and included in many resort packages.

title: Taniti Surf Classic
shortDescription: Watch pro surfers take on the island’s biggest waves.
longDescription: This annual competition brings together top talent from around the world. Food trucks, live music, and beach activities make it a must-see for visitors.

title: Jungle Night Hike
shortDescription: Explore the rainforest with expert guides after dark.
longDescription: Discover Taniti’s nocturnal wildlife and experience the magic of the jungle by moonlight. Limited to 15 guests per night for an intimate adventure.
